title: Subscription Tiers Configuration
requirement:
Create tiered subscription models offering benefits like ad-free listening, high-quality audio, and extended download limits to accommodate a diverse user base.  
#### Screens:  
* Subscription Page: Display subscription tiers and benefits clearly.  
#### Personas:  
* Premium User: Opts for advanced features and ad-free experience.  
* Budget-Conscious User: Chooses affordable tiers with basic functionalities.
